instruction: Compose an email requesting a meeting.
input: Dr. Samuel Smith | Professor at | Stanford University
output:
Dear Dr. Smith,

My name is [Your Name] and I am currently a [Your Major] student at Stanford University. I am writing to request a meeting with you as I am eager to learn more about your research. 

I look forward to having the opportunity to discuss your work and gain more insight into the field. 

Thank you for your time. 

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
